name: Kobold Witch
description: The Kobold Witch is a small and cunning humanoid with exceptional spellcasting abilities, featuring a unique cauldron and various arcane components.
memorable: The Witch's ability to provide tactical support and temporary hit points makes it a unique and strategic opponent.
goals: To support allies while disrupting enemies through tactical spellcasting and abilities.
relations: Often works alongside other Kobolds and magical beings in tactical ambushes.
environment: Commonly found in dark areas or underground lairs.
strengths: High Charisma boosts its spellcasting effectiveness, and Pack Tactics enhances its combat capabilities in groups.
weaknesses: Low physical strength and vulnerability to sunlight hinder its offensive and defensive capabilities outside of dim light.
attacks: The Kobold Witch can make three Eldritch Burst attacks, dealing significant force damage from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: The Hex reaction allows it to hinder opponents' performance at critical moments.
equipment: Holds a small cauldron for crafting brews to support allies.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in low-light conditions.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, which aids in remaining undetected while maneuvering on the battlefield.
additional_information: Uses Scurry to avoid opportunity attacks and navigate traps.
Can cast spells like disguise self and bestow curse for versatility.
Susceptible to sunlight sensitivity, affecting its combat effectiveness.
Good tactical maneuverability allows it to adapt in combat.
Can grant temporary hit points using Witch's Cauldron to support allies.
spellcasting: Utilizes Charisma for spellcasting, featuring a variety of spells for support and control.
test_queries: tactical support character with healing abilities
